OOC: you (Firearm) were firing at Dead-End, Drag Strip acted as 
Dead-End's jump when he (Dead-End) tried to ram Firearm

Dead-End dodges the two charges due to his manoeuvrability at 
high speed. He spins around to face Firearm, shifting into reverse, 
and fires one plasma blast at the bot, then he transforms jumping 
up into the air and fires two blasts from his air-compression gun.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Meanwhile, Drag Strip transformes and fires his gravity gun (it 
causes the gravity to increase in a radius, slowing down all bots 
other than the stunticons) in Firearm's direction, yelling, "Knock 
him out of the sky Dead-End, then let the ram-fest begin!"


On 18 Feb 2001, at 19:41, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::Firearm::
> 
> The shots hit Firearm, throwing him on his back. He flips to his 
> feet, stumbling but once again regaining balance. There was a large 
> amount of pain coming from his chest wound.
> 
> Firearm manages to jump out of the way of Drag Strip, activating his 
> jetpack and launching into the air. He fires two charges down at the 
> speeding car.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: I'm back. I'll be taking control of my chars.
> > 
> > Drag Strip swoops to the ground, transforming into car mode.
> > He fires three plasma blasts at Firearm, then spins around 180 
> > degrees as Dead-End, who was following his lead and had already 
> > transformed into car mode, takes a jump off of him in an attempt to 
> > smash Firearm.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
